mapper.update: UPDATE EXIT_CREDENTIAL SET STATUS = 'DONE', UPDATED_AT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE PAYMENT_ID = #{paymentId} AND STATUS = 'ACTIVE'
mapper.select: SELECT P.PRODUCT_ID, P.NAME, P.PRICE, P.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN PAYMENT_ITEM PI ON P.PRODUCT_ID = PI.PRODUCT_ID JOIN PAYMENT PM ON PI.PAYMENT_ID = PM.PAYMENT_ID JOIN CART C ON PM.CART_ID = C.CART_ID WHERE C.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND P.PRICE BETWEEN #{targetAmount} AND #{targetAmount}+5000 ORDER BY P.PRICE ASC, PI.CREATED_AT DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
